text: Yeh woh log hain jo apne gharon se na-haqq nikal diye gaye sirf is kasoor par ke woh kehte thay “hamara Rubb Allah hai”. Agar Allah logon ko ek dusre ke zariye dafa na karta rahey to khanqahein (monasteries), aur girja (churches) aur mabad (synagogues) aur masjidein, jin mein Allah ka kasrat se naam liye jata hai, sab mismaar (demolished) kar daali jayein. Allah zaroor un logon ki madad karega jo uski madad karenge. Allah bada taaqatwar aur zabardast hai
